summary: Implements the AWS Lambda entry point that orchestrates a Feast batch materialization job. It reads the feature store configuration from an environment variable, initializes the Feast FeatureStore, executes the materialization using the local engine with appropriate batch size, writes the resulting data to Parquet files, and returns a response while handling any errors.
business_intent: Provide a serverless mechanism to run Feast feature store batch materializations on AWS Lambda, enabling automated and scalable generation of feature datasets for downstream machine learning pipelines.
